00034 class SIM_API cExpression : public cObject
00035 {
00036   public:
00039 
00043     explicit cExpression() {}
00044 
00048     cExpression(const cExpression& other) : cObject(other) {}
00049 
00053     virtual ~cExpression() {}
00054 
00058     cExpression& operator=(const cExpression& other) {return *this;}
00060 
00066     virtual cExpression *dup() const {copyNotSupported(); return NULL;}
00067 
00072     virtual std::string info() const {return "";}
00073 
00077     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer)  {throw cRuntimeError(this, eCANTPACK);}
00078

00084 
00087 
00092     virtual bool boolValue(cComponent *context=NULL) = 0;
00093

00100 
00106     virtual double doubleValue(cComponent *context=NULL, const char *expectedUnit=NULL) = 0;
00107 
00112     virtual std::string stringValue(cComponent *context=NULL) = 0;

00120

00127
